title: iDigital
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Inside the story that enraged OpenAI

items.title: My ex-wife said she should have been compensated for working part time during our divorce 20 years ago. Do I owe her?
items.description: “My ex-wife and I both recently retired from federal government jobs, and have comfortable retirements.”

items.title: My father’s widow keeps sending me $200 checks in the mail. Why would she do this?
items.description: “I sent a ‘thank you’ card and asked what it was for, but I got no answer.”

items.title: Nvidia powers world’s largest quantum research supercomputer

items.title: This veteran investor crunches the numbers and sees the risk of a full-blown bear market
items.description: Kotok in his latest email to clients walks through an estimate of just how much tariffs will take a bite out of corporate earnings.

items.title: ‘I’m an idiot’: I’m middle aged, earn $68,000 a year and have $39,000 in credit-card debt
items.description: “I plan on keeping the accounts open to protect my credit, but I will cut and toss all the cards so I can’t use them.”

items.title: Nvidia provides Omniverse Blueprint for AI factory digital twins
